snippet.title: Amusement Expo 2010 - Friction Game Studios - Friction (indie arcade game)
snippet.description:
http://arcadeheroes.com http://gamegridarcade.com

Video of the new indie arcade shooter Friction. Two players can battle through three levels of shooting mayhem where more than just the enemies are destructible. Shooting the many crates, barrels and other equipment to uncover power-ups is half the fun in this game and with each level running at about 10-15 min (boss battles vary) the game packs in plenty of entertainment for the time.
